title: Smart lock not preventing Pixel 4 from requesting PIN
content: I have Smart Lock turned on and it works as advertised.  However, even in the location where it is set to work I often find when I turn the phone on with a tap on the screen (my preference) I see the line that says something like "For added security" then a request for pin entry.  I don't like or need that to happen but see no way to turn it off.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
